article: a us man sent pipe bombs and threats of kidnappings and murders to investment firms and the head of a company in which he held stock in an attempt to artificially inflate stock prices , according to an indictment unsealed wednesday .
abstract: pipe bombs threats aimed at boosting us stock prices
